Title: IMarkupExtension with bindable properties
Description: Demonstrates how to use a custom MarkupExtension to create a FontImageSource with bindable properties.

Title: How to create markup extensions having bindable properties?
Description: Demonstrates how to use a custom MarkupExtension to create a RgbColorExtension with bindable properties.

Title: Concatenate Bold Text with Binding Text in Maui Label
Description: Shows how to use Label.FormattedText for cross-platform style.

Title: Can't pass bound view model as command parameter
Description: Shows how subclassing can simplify binding issues.

Title: How to create a re-useable ContentView as a base view?
Binding Label Text to int value does not work inside a BindableLayout
Description: Demonstrates RadioButton BindingContext fixes to RadioButton.Content.

Title: IconImageSource and ToolbarItem not working as expected
Description: Shows the DPI Font Size workaround needed for Windows.

Title: Why does my .NET MAUI image cross grid cell boundaries?
Description: Shows how to use Grid and Image controls with scaling.

Title: MAUI ZXing.Net.Maui.Controls hide camera is not working
Description: Shows how to use ContentView to control the visibility of CameraBarcodeReaderView.
